A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A weak movie\, that is.\nNow even though I would have tolerated a middle of the roadish Sci-fi movie with numerous plot holes\, hollow characters\, barely any suspense\, I do not tolerate such a movie if it's a Star Wars. They had the biggest budget possible\, they could have cast anyone in the world. And yet all they can come up with is a mediocre film. I tried real hard to keep this review spoiler-free but you'll see soon enough if you watch the movie which plot holes i'm talking about. Some of them are quite.......ridiculous. See for yourself...
